name: Navigation
body:
## Navigation For application that use the keyboard (Smart TV) ## Install bower: `bower install navigation` ## Attributes - `nv-scope` - declared scope for navigation - `nv-scope-current` - marked and set this scope as active for first load - `nv-el` - navigation element - `nv-el-current` - marked and set this element as active for first load ### Example ```html
Element 1
Element 2
Element 3
``` ## Class - `nv-scope` - add for scopes element - `nv-scope-current` - add for current scope element - `nv-el` - add for navigation elements - `nv-el-current` - add for current navigation element ```html
Element 1
Element 2
Element 3
``` ## Event listener ### Default events nv-left, nv-right, nv-up, nv-down, nv-enter ### How to add event handler ```js document.body.addEventListener('nv-left', function (event) { // logic }); ```
